item.title: By: David
item.dc:creator: David
item.description: How can I redeem my 10k airtime I was given, it's not showing in my balance when I dialed *556#
item.content:encoded: How can I redeem my 10k airtime I was given, it’s not showing in my balance when I dialed *556#
